notes: This map illustrates the satellite-detected surface water evolution of  Dinh Binh Lake, Vinh Thanh District, Binh Dinh Province, Vietnam, as detected by Sentinel-1 images acquired on 26 October 2016 and 07 November 2016.  An increase of surface water extent was detected in the 07 November 2016 image, particularly in the upstream part of the lake : ~500 ha of surface water were observed the 26 October 2016 and reached ~930 ha the 07 November 2016 corresponding to an evolution of about 85%. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
